job.title: Sr. Data Scientist
job.description: There is only one Data Cloud Snowflakes founders started from scratch and designed a data platform built for the cloud that is effective affordable and accessible to all data users But it didnt stop there They engineered Snowflake to power the Data Cloud where thousands of organizations unlock the value of their data with nearunlimited scale concurrency and performance This is our vision a world with endless insights to tackle the challenges and opportunities of today and reveal the possibilities of tomorrowbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliProvide technical and thought leadership designing testing and implementing methodologies to forecast and monitor metric time seriesliliDevelop algorithms to detect anomalies assess risksthreats and core metric fluctuations with our Security teamliliConduct adhoc analysis to understand unexpected metric movements and communicate results to other data scientists product managers and company leadershipliliInterface with engineers product managers and product analysts to understand data needs and help build data products that inform our Security posture and strategy liliDrive the design building and launching of new data models and data pipelines in production brliulstronguMinimum Qualificationsbrustrongulli5 years experience doing quantitative analysis or statistical modelinglili5 years writing SQL statementsliliExpertise in one of Python R Julia if R or Julia candidate must be able to make algorithms scaleliliWorking knowledge of at least one modeling framework eg scikitlearn TensorFlow SAS R MATLABliliFamiliarity with basic classes of ML algorithms concepts in feature extraction and selectionliliAbility to communicate your analysis with clarity and precisionliliExperience implementing statistical models in productiongrade codebrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliMSPhD in Computer Science Math Physics or other technical fieldliliExperience with data visualizationlili4 years experience using Python brliulSnowflake is growing fast and were scaling our team to help enable and accelerate our growth We are looking for people who share our values challenge ordinary thinking and push the pace of innovation while building a future for themselves and SnowflakebrbrHow do you want to make your impact
